name: 2048 (itch) (nanoflite)
description:
Port of 2048 to Commodore 8-bit machines C64 and PET4032

[https://github.com/nanoflite/2048-cc65]

The following ports are functional:
 * C64
 * CBM PET 4032

Running...

Using VICE (https://vice-emu.sourceforge.io/)

C64:

$> x64 2048_cbm_c64.prg

CMB PET 4032

$> xpet -model 4032 2048_cbm_pet_4032.prg

Using the REAL machines...

... transfer to tape / disk / use SD card ...

How to play...

# Use WASD keys, Enter starts game

... jo h  a   n
